definition: to make/to build/to manufacture/to invent/to fabricate/to go to/party (in a lawsuit or legal agreement)/crop/classifier for crops
various genera of flowers of Asteracea family (daisies and chrysanthemums), including Atractylis lancea

sentences.english: The sketch is all plastic arts foundation.
sentences.chinese: 素描是一切造型藝術的基礎。

sentences.english: As a basis of plastic arts, sketch is unique to the art of painting.
sentences.chinese: 素描作爲造型藝術的基礎，有其自身獨特的藝術魅力。

sentences.english: China's traditional graphic arts and plastic arts in the design of the application.
sentences.chinese: 中國傳統圖形藝術和造型藝術中的應用程序設計。

sentences.english: Though much smaller in size, Han Dynasty figurines are artistically better.
sentences.chinese: 漢俑形體雖小，但其造型藝術比秦俑有了很大的提高。

sentences.english: Sketch is the basic of any plastic arts.
sentences.chinese: 素描，是任何造型藝術的基礎。

definition: Marcus Tullius Cicero (106-43 BC), famous Roman politician, orator and philosopher, murdered at the orders of Marc Anthony
Suzhou embroidery, one of the four major traditional styles of Chinese embroidery (the other three being 湘繡|湘绣[Xiang1 xiu4], 粵繡|粤绣[Yue4 xiu4] and 蜀繡|蜀绣[Shu3 xiu4])
